item.title: American actor Zac Efron trolled with 'Shrek' character
item.description: American actor Zac Efron trolled with ‘Shrek’ character Zac Efron has been trolled with ‘Shrek’ character Lord Farquaad meme after he debuted muscular shocking look on film set.

item.title: American actor-filmmaker Tom Hanks makes surprise appearance at Saturday Night Live episode
item.description: American actor-filmmaker Tom Hanks makes surprise appearance at Saturday Night Live episode Hanks made a surprise appearance on the recent episode of 'Saturday Night Live' in a sketch with host Jack Harlow that spoofed Hollywood's portrayal of the culture of America's South

item.title: Big stars like Brad Pitt fuel our show's engine, says Irish-British actor Graham Norton
item.description: Big stars like Brad Pitt fuel our show’s engine, says Irish-British actor Graham Norton Norton, who has returned with the 30th season of his popular eponymous show, said he would like to invite Hollywood star Brad Pitt to the show’s notorious red couch.

item.title: American rapper Cardi B and singer Madonna make amends after online feud
